name: Hub
description: A smart hub is essentially a control center for the smart devices in your home. The hub lets you connect, communicate, and manage different devices from one interface.

name: Sensor
description: Smart-home sensors are incredibly powerful detection and data-collection devices that can make a home more comfortable, efficient and safe.

name: Controller
description: A smart switch offers a convenient way to control your lights with a tap, smartphone app, or voice command.

name: Camera
description: Smart cameras are an excellent addition to any modern home.

name: DoorLock
description: Smart door locks are becoming an increasingly popular means of safeguarding homes and offices everywhere.

name: Lighting
description: The ability to set lighting automations ensures you do not leave bulbs on when not in use

name: Curtain Controller
description: Smart curtain controllers automate your privacy and comfort, but they can also help reduce energy bills throughout the year.
